channel.title: Final Project Presentations on JavaScript

item.title: Presentation Script
item.description: Presentation Script Each student will use the script below to present their projects to the class Introduce yourself and your project Question: Why did you choose to build this project? Provide the class with a quick demo of your project Question: What was the most challenging aspect your project? Question: Given more time and knowledge what additional features would you have added? Question: What did you enjoy most about building this project?
